name: Distress Call (sniderka, KamoStomp)
description:
You received a distress call from Mark. You go investigate the spaceship. Something is wrong. Very wrong. 

A game made for the Themed Horror Game Jam #6 with the theme Among the Stars. Our first horror game. All assets made by Ines and programming by Jani. 

Controls: 

Keyboard: WASD movement, left mouse click for doors and oxygen tank.

Gamepad: left stick movement and south button for doors and oxygen tank 

Best played with headphones and gamepad and with lights off.
